entry.title: [RBX1][Network] - Migrating network equipments in 2 steps
entry.content:
Jun 9, 02:08 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 8, 00:51 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 8, 00:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/06/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 09/06/2023 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Managment IP might be unavailbale for 3 minutes on some servers in RBX1.
Service improvement : As part of the end-of-life process, we will be migrating some network devices in end-of-life to new infrastructure in order to improve our reliability.
This operation will handled in 2 steps to avoid any outage.
Step 1 : From 07/06/2023 19:00 UTC to 08/06/2023 02:00 UTC
Step 2 : From 08/06/2023 19:00 UTC to 09/06/2023 02:00 UTC

entry.title: [RBX8][Dedicated servers]-Rooms R807L and R809R
entry.content:
Jun 8, 16:43 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/06/2023 08:52 UTC
End Time : 07/06/2023 20:14 UTC
Root cause : lack of detailed information in the technical documentation and a failure to follow a procedural requirement
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 7, 20:14 UTC
Update - All impacted services are operational.
We continue to monitor the situation.

Jun 7, 16:44 UTC
Monitoring - Nearly all impacted servers (>95%) are operational.
We are monitoring the situation for the time being.
Our technical teams are working on the few remaining ones.

Jun 7, 14:11 UTC
Update - Most of the impacted servers are up and operational.
Our technical teams are hands on the remaining ones.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Jun 7, 10:21 UTC
Update - Racks impacted :R809R01 R809R02 R809R03 R809R04 R809R05 R809R06 R809R07 R809R08 R809R09 R809R10 R809R11 R809R12 R809R13 R809R14 R809R15

Jun 7, 09:51 UTC
Update - New impacts :R807L27 R807L09 R807L11 R807L10 R807L13 R807L12 R807L15 R807L14 R807L01 R807L04 R807L03 R807L06 R807L05 R807L07

Jun 7, 09:41 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 7, 09:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2023 08:52 UTC
Service impact : All servers on these racks rebooted.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack W14B01
entry.content:
Jun 8, 03:15 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 08/06/2023 02:26 UTC
End Time : 08/06/2023 02:46 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a circuit breaker that tripped following a problem with our cooling system.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 8, 02:48 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 08/06/2023 02:26 UTC
Service impact : IPMI switch on W14B01 rack are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
